summary: Discontinued until RLO\'s weathers are 100% complete.
descriptionHtml:
ENB is now based on a personal setting, however I am still not allowing any re-distribution of this file. [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]You can download the d3d9.dll from here.[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/IfssV.png[/img]

[i][b][color=red][size=5]STATUS: DISCONTINUED (But still works)[/i][/b][/color][/size]

[i][b][size=4]I\'m working on Realistic Lighting Overhaul now, and I am discontinuing this mod until RLO\'s weathers are fully released. I\'ll leave the files up for download, but you\'ll have to edit things on your own if you want something changed.

The re-uploading restriction still applies, so please don\'t make edits and then release it as your own preset. Have fun, and I\'ll return to editing and ENB when the weathers are done.[/size][/b][/i] 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[i][b][color=orange][size=5]ENB Features:[/i][/b][/color][/size]
[b]SSAO + Indirect Lighting
Custom Softened Bokeh DOF
God Rays
Shadow Fix
Sky Lighting
Reflections
Performance Options (See Readme in Download)[/b]

[i][b][color=orange][size=5]Creation Kit Changes:[/i][/b][/color][/size]
[i]Orange tinted sunsets and yellow tinted sunrises.
Natural Nights including lighting and tint changes.
Customized and tweaked bloom.
Sky lighting and brightness changes.[/i]

[i][b][color=orange][size=5]Screenshots and Comments:[/i][/b][/color][/size]
[b]Feel free to add your own screenshots and leave a comment![/b]

[i][b][color=green][size=5]REQUIREMENTS: (In Order)[/i][/b][/color][/size]
[i]1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450/]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url] (Use the 3.5 Legacy Weathers) [color=red][size=3](CoT was sub-par for what I was hoping for. RLO Weathers in developement.)[/size][/color]
2. My ini settings from v1.1 in the Downloads (Listed as a Main File)
3. The d3d9.dll from ENBDev.com (Optional, Version 0.139 needed.) [color=red][size=3](OUTDATED)[/size][/color]
[i]4. The ENB Settings listed in the Downloads (Main File) (Optional)[/i]


[i][b][size=4]RECOMMENDED GRAPHICS MODS:[/i][/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4910/]Dramatic Clouds[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1598]Enhanced Distant Terrain[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85]Enhanced Night Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10383]Better Dynamic Snow[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27563]Wet and Cold[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801]Texture Pack Combiner[/url] [b][color=red]Warning: for higher-end computers only.[/color][/b]
author: Daemon White

files.name: Daemons ini REBOOT 1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Sun and sunlight less intense (ENB and CK Change)
fog and volumetric fog brightened during daytime (ENB Change)
SSAO Tweaked (ENB Change)
SkyLighting Enabled for Ultra Preset (ENB Change)
Sunlight increased for Dawns and Dusks (CK Change)
Nights brightened and tweaked Sunscale (Moonlight) (CK Change)
Sky lighting decreased on cloudy days, dawns, and dusks (CK Change)
Dusk tint desaturated and changed to be more reddish (CK Change)
Torch radius doubled (CK Change)
Interior bloom threshold increased (Less bloom) (CK Change)
Sunlight lowered for rainy, stormy, and snowy weathers. (CK Change)
